website_summaries.verdict: This unique brow powder is made by a top company and stands out for the convenience the container and wand offer.
pros: A unique powder formula that comes in a handy tube with a wand applicator
Easy to apply to brows and blend for a natural look
Color is highly pigmented and wears all day long
Made by a top brand in cosmetics
cons: Product tends to fall off the wand during application and land on eyelids and cheeks

customer_reviews.title: Not blonde
customer_reviews.text: I typically use the Cover Girl soft blonde brow pencil. I expected this would be comparable. The brow fill goes on nice and smooth. However, the soft blonde is. It blonde at all. It goes on dark brown. My natural brow compared with soft blonde brow fill.
customer_reviews.author: tinkerchelle

customer_reviews.title: Blonde #815 way too dark
customer_reviews.text: If someone has brown hair, I would order this #815 Light Blonde. It comes out brown and it's the lightest color they sell. My old brows are thinning with age and my hair is grayish blonde. I went from almost no color in my eyebrows to this blond which is way too dark so it looks fake on someone like me. What's worse than a natural look if that is what someone is trying to achieve, is a clown painted face overly done. Sorry, just my opinion. I will not send it back It was inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Baba

customer_reviews.text: Not really sure what to rate it since I couldn't use it. Once again the blonde shade is way too dark.
customer_reviews.author: A. Douthit

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty dark.
customer_reviews.text: Their idea of blonde and mine are clearly quite different. This is pretty dark.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Deevers

customer_reviews.title: Go lighter than you think you should.
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage. I found one of these in a clearance bin and tried it. That one was way darker than I needed so I bought this one. Next time I will try the even lighter shade as it's still a little too dark
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Powerfully black!
customer_reviews.text: I have salt & pepper hair. Eyebrows are thinning, so needed something to fill in. Wanted to match the black in my hair/eyebrows ... but WOW. This makeup is REALLY black. Looked like Halloween makeup. Maybe good for some people, but just make sure you want very black!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: SO HAPPY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best deal I have ever found for this product and I love this product. It is so easy to use and works great, but CVS charged way too much for any makeup products. So when I found it on here and for this price I bought 4.
customer_reviews.author: LoisIris

customer_reviews.title: The Rich Brown color is perfect color for my eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: It does it job covering up my space where I am missing a few hairs on my eyebrows. The Rich Brown color is perfect color for my eyebrows. I bought the Black one as well that's too dark for my hair color.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: This product sprays a fine powder on my face when carefully applying to the eye brow, and is difficult to get off the skin, particularly under the eye.
customer_reviews.author: Aimers

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It’s the only brow filler product I like. Rimmel used to make a similar product and I was so upset when they discontinued it so I’m very happy that I found it again with Covergirl! I use the blonde for my brown eyebrows, so it’s a bit on the dark side but it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Looks ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: This looks awful once you get it on, it looked like paint or something, I have no clue how this won an Allure award because it is the farthest thing from natural or pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color!
customer_reviews.text: This is the wrong color. The one I had at home was 810, and was the color I wanted, Soft Brown. This was labeled as 815, and was too dark for me to use.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Leclair

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Easy to use and lasts the day. You can use less or more depending on your desired look.
customer_reviews.author: K. Short

customer_reviews.title: Very dark
customer_reviews.text: Soft blonde is very dark! I would it’s more a medium brown. Really hard to find a good blonde color!
customer_reviews.author: Tawny

customer_reviews.title: super easy
customer_reviews.text: this eyebrow powder is so easy to use, and it's easy to take off. It will stay on all day long and looks natural (if you get the right color anyways)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle8

customer_reviews.title: Best Eyebrow Powder!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brow powder! The powder is easy to apply. I use a brow brush to evenly distribute it. I stopped using brow pencils and gels as I saw that my brows were thinning out from the pressure of applying it daily. I tried all brands from high end to low end. I havent found anything better! Must try!
customer_reviews.author: Christie Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this brow fill. Works and blends so good. Easy to remove and very easy to apply
customer_reviews.author: Jess Mac

customer_reviews.title: Love this brow filler!  I’ve used it for years.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite and I had almost given up on finding it!! Thank goodness Amazon has it. I bought three lol!!
customer_reviews.author: Jayme chapa

customer_reviews.title: Soft color ! Applicator easy to use. The powder does not cake up like eyebrow pencils
customer_reviews.text: It is an eyebrow pencil and I love it. Easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Isn’t messy.
customer_reviews.text: Use for my eyebrows that I appear to be losing permanently. Brushes on easily and doesn’t make a mess like the liquid or cremes/creams. Brows look more natural.
customer_reviews.author: B. DeHaven

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite brow product that I can’t find in stores anymore. Goes on like a liquid with a powdery finish.
customer_reviews.author: Lenore

customer_reviews.title: Terrible...
customer_reviews.text: The product seems dry and crumbly... I've been finding fragments on my face all day and did not use alot in fear if it being too dark. I recommend you look for another brand. I'll keep using my eyeliner and brow brush.
customer_reviews.author: Margo

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: It would be 5 star but it smears I have to touch it up through out the day.
customer_reviews.author: LA02

customer_reviews.title: Best eyebrow filler
customer_reviews.text: Love this to enhance my eyebrows! Best product I have found and will continue to order
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Samuels

customer_reviews.title: “Soft Brown” not true
customer_reviews.text: Dissatisfied with the color. It stated it was soft brown l, but the product is anything but soft brown! It is way too dark and I cannot use it!
customer_reviews.author: nanci

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this brow filler. Just the right shade for me, not fake looking and covers my greys.
customer_reviews.author: TinasDogs

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Softer way to apply brow cover and seems to last
customer_reviews.author: Charmed One

customer_reviews.title: Blends and fills well
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Had my eyebrows microbladed and unfortunately after touch ups I permanently lost a lot of my eyebrow hair. This goes on easy and fills nicely so you can’t tell. Doesn’t flake off.
customer_reviews.author: MA1

customer_reviews.title: As is but check the color before buying it
customer_reviews.text: It’s the same one that I used to have but I didn’t check the color of it. It’s darker than what I use.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: If you like eyebrow powder.. this is for you!
customer_reviews.text: I find it to be the best eyebrow powder out there and I've tried so many, including gels, pencils, etc and always come back to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the look of this at all and actually threw it away. Not a good buy
customer_reviews.author: WMD0926

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I love the way my eyebrows look after using this. It’s lasts the full day, I will definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Rosas

customer_reviews.title: I like it but it needs to be set with something else it's smears easily
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use good color but it's mirrors so be ready to set it with something like clear mascara or there are things
customer_reviews.author: annalee

customer_reviews.title: Saved my eyebrow dilemma 😅
customer_reviews.text: Great... I have always used this product and couldn't find it in the stores anymore....happy that it is available and received it quicker than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Diaz-Avila

customer_reviews.title: Smooth application
customer_reviews.text: Love it, smooth and easy to apply. Stays in place and won't smudge.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria L

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It's my favorite brow product Very hard to find Glad I could get it on Amazon It works perfect for me
customer_reviews.author: Joan J Duracka

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Been using for years due to overplucking. Does a great job and looks natural
customer_reviews.author: Moira salak

customer_reviews.title: Classic eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: Awesome coverage to fill in thin brows. I find that this works better than brow pencils.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fills in Eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: I have sparse eyebrows. This product fills in the eyebrow and looks so natural
customer_reviews.author: horseofcoursetoo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome brow product....
customer_reviews.text: Now my brows only take a minute or two to do.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea R.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY eyebrow I love!! Unfortunately I cannot find it in the stores any longer, but Amazon has come to my rescue once again. Love this stuff because I have strawberryblonde hair and it’s a perfect shade. Just make sure you tap the excess off. Lasts for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Jennah Cardwell

customer_reviews.title: Not a big fan
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the powder brows. I have trouble controlling it & making it look natural. I prefer waxier pencils & brow mascara when doing my brows but I prefer natural/fast makeup & am also not good at makeup so I need things that are goof proof. Powder brows are too easy for me to goof & look like a drag queen. A time & a place for everything but drag queen is not my go to everyday brow. I also have pretty strong natural brows already so i just need to spruce them up.
customer_reviews.author: Yves

customer_reviews.title: East to use and good color
customer_reviews.text: I really love this brow powder and I really wish it would have worked for me. It goes on well and stays put. The coverage is nice too. It's so easy to use. Unfortunately for me, I couldn't find a color that matched my brows well. This rich brown was the closest I could find to match my hair color and it was too dark. The other option would have been too light. But if you are a true dark brunette, this is the color for you.
customer_reviews.author: yukicharley

customer_reviews.title: Looks natural and not drawn on.
customer_reviews.text: This eyebrow powder is great. Fills in eyebrows realistically, and doesn’t come off until you take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Fran B

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: Best eyebrow product I have ever used. Goes on smooth & stays on. Only complaint is: dries out in bottle quickly. Then it gets powdery!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Conger

customer_reviews.title: Applicator is too thick
customer_reviews.text: Stays well, but want is thick foam so you can't make your brows look realistic.
customer_reviews.author: Puwdy pad

customer_reviews.title: Messy!
customer_reviews.text: Not what I thought it would be. Too messy. It’s like paint.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much darker than I expected. I will not use regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Phillips

customer_reviews.title: use sparingly
customer_reviews.text: This product is great to fill in spots from years of tweezing my eyebrows. It will last most of the day and water will wash it away.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Color comes out even and easy application.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best brow enhancer/filler! Love it. It is so easy to use. Don’t change a thing! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: ITSatWork4U

customer_reviews.title: It's the best brow makeup ever!
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to use, how natural it looks and how long it lasts (all day & evening).
customer_reviews.author: Ronni40

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Very unnatural color- seems like the product has dried up
customer_reviews.author: Tena Gaither

customer_reviews.title: Darker than expected
customer_reviews.text: Darker than expected for being ‘blonde’ in color. Stays on nicely though
customer_reviews.author: jennifer griffin

product_meta.title: COVERGIRL Easy Breezy Brow Fill Plus Shape Plus Define Powder Eyebrow Makeup, Soft Brown, 0.024 Ounce (packaging may vary)
product_meta.description: Color:Soft BrownEasy Breezy Brow Fill + Shape + Define Powder, eyebrow makeup for a boldly defined brow look. The silky eyebrow powder formula acts as an eyebrow filler that shapes, and defines brows then stays in place. The flexible applicator flexes to your brow shape for precise application.
feature_bullets: Eyebrow makeup for a boldly defined brow look
Silky eyebrow powder formula fills, shapes, and defines brows
Our eyebrow filler has a flexible applicator that flexes to your brow shape for precise application
Adheres to brows and stays in place
